text: Kate Middleton will 'never trust' Prince Harry again and there is 'no going back', new book claims
title: Latest news, pictures, video of the Duchess of Cambridge

meta_data.description: Kate Middleton, the Princess of Wales, is the wife of Prince William, the heir to the throne.
